name: Slime Revolver
description:
You're a skeleton on a slime farm.

Fight off enemies, upgrade your character and farm slime. More slime!

Green slimes are yours! If all green slimes dies, you WILL DIE! (or not, skeletons dont die)

Your stylish revolver can do a lot! You can kill angry slimes, or you can farm  green slimes by shooting them.

You'll figure it out on the go! Let's start!
